original_text:
For as a young man marries a young woman,
    so shall your sons marry you,
and as the bridegroom rejoices over the bride,
    so shall your God rejoice over you.
korean_text: 마치 청년이 처녀와 결혼함 같이 네 아들들이 너를 취하겠고 신랑이 신부를 기뻐함 같이 네 하나님이 너를 기뻐하시리라

sentences.original_text: For as a young man marries a young woman,
so shall your sons marry you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그처럼 너희 아들들이 너희를 맞이할 것이요,

sentences.original_text: and as the bridegroom rejoices over the bride,
so shall your God rejoice over you.
